basic.description: Provides opportunities to consider the theoretical bases of engaging teaching practices and the practical implications of research on the teaching of physics.  The course includes a focus on planning for the first days of teaching, for the development of a career as a science teacher, and for judging the quality of students' learning.  The course also provides an opportunity for self-directed learning in the preparation of a teaching resource.
basic.subject: CURR
basic.title: Physics Teach Theory&Prac (IS)
